duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect and acquire new business customers through strategic sales tactics and relationship building.
Maintain a book of residual income by managing and expanding customer accounts.
Prioritize sales opportunities and manage multiple touch points with potential clients.
Engage in face-to-face sales meetings, networking events, and business discussions to promote and sell products and services.
Utilize a custom CRM platform to support client acquisition and simplify the sales process.
Establish and maintain client relationships to drive future revenue growth and ensure customer satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
